<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|double|acceleration_power}}: The magnitude of the acceleration in the direction of motion. Every tick, this value is multipled with the normal of {{nbt|list|Motion}} and then that vector is added to {{nbt|list|Motion}}. If the magnitude of {{nbt|list|Motion}} is zero, no acceleration is applied.
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
